title: Picnics Are Fun and Dino's Serenade

sources.title: Picnics Are Fun and Dino's Serenade (1959)
sources.description: Picnics Are Fun and Dino's Serenade is a Jolly Frolics cartoon directed by Fred Crippen, Lew Keller. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/picnics-are-fun-and-dinos-serenade-1959/

metadata.Plot: A "Ham & Hattie" cartoon which means two different cartoons splitting the seven minutes of running time. "Picnics are Fun" finds Hattie taking her two dolls for a picnic in the 'Country"---the roof of her apartment building where the trees, flowers and greenery grow only in her fertile imagination; the second offering, "Dino's Serenade", has Ham & His World Players doing a sketch about a strolling musician, the girl he loves and the villain who steals her away.
